Range Safety Officer (Air Rifle) Course

The Range Safety Officer - Air Rifle (RSO (AR)) course will provide you with the skills, knowledge and attitudes to conduct safe air rifle marksmanship and biathlon activities.

 

The course has three parts:

 

•this online qualification course;

•a practical rifle handling test; and

•a practical certification assessment, supervised by a current RSO.

 

You must complete all three parts to become a certified RSO.

 

Click here for details on how to navigate this course.
